## Shape.LeftToCorner property

获取和设置形状从工作表左边框的水平偏移量。

```csharp
public int LeftToCorner { get; set; }
```

### 例子

```csharp

[C#]
if (shape.LeftToCorner == 3)
    shape.LeftToCorner = 1;
```
